title: Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
Today on The Dan Patrick Show, Doug Gottlieb and Jason McIntyre fill in for the DP crew and jump right into some NBA, specifically Kyrie Irving embracing the villain role. Plus, NBA insider Frank Isola joins the show to discuss Kyrie Irving’s antics in Boston, NBA playoffs, and more! Then, NBA vet and 7x champion 'Big Shot Bob' Robert Horry joins the show to talk playoffs, the Lakers coaching search, and more!

#douggottliebshow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
